website_summaries.verdict: An extra-comfy ride for children up to 65 pounds, yet compact enough to create more leg room for the adult in front.
pros: Parents love that larger vehicles can fit as many as 3 of these models across to allow for bigger families, and seats growing children comfortably
Cushion is plush and soft enough for longer car trips
cons: Can be difficult to install as a rear-facing chair
Some expressed a desire for a handle to easily carry from home to car

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really fit 3 across in the third row of an SUV that seats 8...
customer_reviews.text: The seats seem comfy, love the higher weight limit...but when they say that they fit 3 across....don't bet on it. I barely got them wedged into a Toyota Sequoia SUV. Almost lost a few fingers doing it..they are REALLY wedged in. A half inch more room would have worked better...or if the cover fabric was slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but there are better budget seats!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is as advertised but the materials are cheap, the installation is difficult, and the headrest and straps are a pain to adjust. I spent an extra 20 bucks to get the Graco Contender 65 and it is amazing, especially compared to this. Spend a few more bucks to get the Contender. The quality is well worth the small price difference. I just didn't feel confident that my baby was safe in this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Finally leg room for the front seat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our almost 6 month old granddaughter. She's 26" and weighs 16 pounds. Easy to install in my 2008 chevy impala. Rear facing gives lots of front passenger leg room!! Just ordered another for my daughter to replace the one she has to keep lugging around and snapping into the base. I highly recommend this seat for a compact car or any car you'd like to give more front passenger leg room.
customer_reviews.author: Designing Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the great price.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. We bought it for plane travel and to have a backup for Grammy's car. It worked for the plane and then couldn't get it tight enough in the rental car or Ubers. We thought it would just take more time to install so we kept it for Grammy's car. Nope, we just tried to install it and you cannot get it tight enough no matter what you do. It moves a good 4 inches each way. FYI we need it rear facing for a 14 month old.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Safest
customer_reviews.text: This carseat was put to the test the dat after i received it. I was driving my kids back from daycare when someone ran a red light and hit us. My babies walked away with no injuries. We will be buying this again to replace the one in the accident. Buy this carseat it saved my children.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good price good car seat
customer_reviews.text: Good price for good car seat. Soft and comfy. Using for my 4year old. Slimmer than most car seats out there. Needed to fit infant car seat and toddler seat in back seat of car and still needed space in between them in case I have to sit in back with baby. Leaves enought space to fit a person in the middle. One thing I don't like, but I've noticed all toddler car seats are like that (as many as I have tried). The buckle belt in the croch area is short, so it's a bit tight in the thighs when buckled. My 4 year old is an average size (hight and weight; wears 4t clothes, if that helps).
customer_reviews.author: Like shopping

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents’ house because I didn’t want to fly with my car seat upon going to visit them. I loved it so much I brought it back home with me. It’s just a comfortable, easy to use, easy to clean car seat. Smaller than some of the big car seats but lots of room. Great for that in between infant car seat and big kid car seat stage. Great for allowing more room in the back seat (we could still fit two adults in the back with this seat installed).
customer_reviews.author: StarSculptress

customer_reviews.title: No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This seat does save space BUT it just feels flimsy. The buckle is thin. Even when installed properly in the rear facing position it lifts forward to the point of the top of the chair hitting the seat it's attached to. The solution in the user manual is a rolled towl of pool noodle ( which is minimal help). Really? I'm supposed to trust my child's saftey to a pool noodle??? No thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is by far our favorite car seat that we've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far our favorite car seat that we've owned. Before this one, we were gifted a very expensive convertible car seat. No matter what we did, we could not get it inserted to where we were fully comfortable with it. It was hard to pack from car to car, it was bulky. We bought this one for an upcoming second child and ended up purchasing another one to replace our first child's old one. Its very light, but very sturdy when inserted. It's slim. The padding is very soft and my toddler and newborn both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This car seat looks and feels very unsafe. I bought it for its lower price for a second car seat, and for the space saving option, and it does not meet any expectations. It takes up just as much space as a regular car seat and feels very unstable and not safe to put my child in. She is still rear facing and it doesn’t stay in place properly rear faced. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible rear facing fit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this seat for our 16 month old who has now outgrown her infant seat but should remain rear facing. It just doesn’t fit right when rear facing. The shape of it alone would mean it will never be secured good enough. I don’t understand how this has so many good reviews. Just terrible. Returned and bought a real car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Unsecure and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of how narrow and affordable it was. Never used it as a forward facing, but the rear facing installation just isn’t isn’t very secure. The base is not the right shape and the seat moves back and forth way too much to be very safe. My daughter also hated the seat. The head test is a little too poofy behind the head so her head was constantly bent forward. She cried everyone we buckled her in. We ended up just bucking up and paying for a Diono and she loves it and it’s MUCH more secure. This seat is not worth the cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: Christina and Spence

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, takes up less space, don’t like the cup holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat except for the cup holder. I understand why they can’t have an incorporated cup holder because it would make this seat wider but at least allow the cup holder to properly clip in and stay secure. I can’t get the thing to clip in. Other than that the car seat is great. It has lots of padding so baby likes to lay her head against it. It’s easy to install and it fits great in the car! We don’t have to move the seats up which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat for our golf cart and it fits perfectly. The seat is narrow enough to fit on the seat with plenty of room for me to sit next to it. It’s also spacious enough for my toddler to fit in comfortably. It fits perfectly sitting straight up but also fits great when reclined! Love this. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice but huge safety issue with harness
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved this item, bought it as our second car car seats. Our son was very comfortable, just used it for to and from school. The 3 point harness is secured by a T bar in the back of the chair. After a few weeks of use the shoulder portion of the harness started falling off the T bar. Everytime we loosened the straps to get him out of the car it would fall off. So with that being a huge safety issue we decided to return it. And get a Graco Slimfit instead.
customer_reviews.author: Spookiebutt

customer_reviews.title: Like it but don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: i like the car seats BUT they fit weird in the back of my 2015 Nissan Pathfinder. Supposedly 3 in a row can fit, however, that is not the case here. I have triplets and 2/3 needed a convertible car seat and still need to be rear facing. Anyway, I put my boys next to each other, the middle seat is angled funny but it works. I just wish it fit better. Another small complaint I have is the release button. It's really hard to push when you're trying to take your baby out.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of rear installation fit
customer_reviews.text: Decent and simple car seat. Appearance is nice and clean and simple classy. It takes up about the same space rear facing as an infant removable one does, looks like a lot of leg room when it converts to forward facing though. Biggest complaint is when installed rear facing the headrest part will push forward toward the seat it’s installed on. The manufacturer said this was ok and operating as should be. My other rear facing seat (Diono) came with a tether to prevent this from happening. I just improvised.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mom

customer_reviews.title: For Grandma's car
customer_reviews.text: This is for grandmas car. I have a Britax CLICKTIGHT for my truck. I hate having to manually tighten the Cosco65 in grandmas car (as it gets moved for her own purposes). I am spoiled with my Britax. I will say this works perfect for grandmas car, who baby doesnt travel with much. But this allows us to bot have to be moving seats. If you need a cheap seat for that extra vehicle, this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: moo.point

customer_reviews.title: **CANNOT SAFELY INSTALL REAR FACING**
customer_reviews.text: **CANNOT SAFELY INSTALL REAR FACING** It’s impossible. It is not completely secure and moves in directions that does not feel safe. It seemed to be secure front facing but I’m not comfortable with my child facing forward yet. I’ll keep in case it’s needed as last resort, for a grandparent when she can sit forward.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with item
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this for our second car. I have the Graco 4ever carseat in my car and I purchased this for my husband's. So far, we are happy with this seat. It seems very spacious for my 7 month old and he seemed to enjoy it. I think for the price this is a good value. I was surprised by how cushiony the seat is. Very soft and padded. Easy to install and easy to adjust straps and headrests. The seat also reclines although I have not tried that option yet. It comes with a detachable cupholder. I read the seat pads can be removed and easily washed. Fits nicely in our Hyundai Sonata.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Jergler

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for this car seat. My son outgrew his infant carrier so I purchased this one thinking it would be easy to install and to buckle him in. I was wrong! The belt was hard to move and I could never get the angle right in my car and it was always loose no matter how much I tightened the latch straps or the seatbelt when I had it installed that way. I do not recommend for rear facing infants. It may work perfectly for older babies.
customer_reviews.author: A Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but not great rear-facing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carseat because it is lightweight and doesn't take up a ton of room, which is why we got it. However, when my son was rear-facing, I never felt like I could get it very securely installed because the base is curved (whereas bigger convertible carseats have a square base normally that goes directly along the entire seat). Now that he faces forward, though, it's the perfect carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great for Travel, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my daughter to use on an airplane and at the airport for her to sit on while lugging her around on luggage dolly. It was very helpful and she loved it. It looked very comfortable and was very cute looking as well. Definitely worth the price and it arrived quickly in the mail. I highly recommend using this on an airplane ride if you are concerned your 2 year old won't sit still or won't be able to sleep sitting in her own seat. Excellent for on the go and easily adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Guye

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and durable car seat- great deal for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality car seat without the 300-400 dollar price tag. Sturdy, straps in well, the child fits perfect in the seat with good leg room and the straps are well fitted. My other car seat was too bulky and took up too much room in the backseat. This one is easy to transfer from one vehicle to another if needed and its lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Harris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only purchased Diono car seats, but ever since the recall they’re all gone! I bought this because it fits 3 wide and I’m impressed by how soft the fabric is. Overall super happy and would buy again, especially at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is for small cars
customer_reviews.text: Get this car seat if you have a small car or a two door car. I love that these don’t have cup holders because I can get my child in and out of the car seat easily from my tiny car with 2 doors. I went through so many car seats that was comfortable enough to fit in my car and this was the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: er1gurl

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Lightweight and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to have an extra car seat for my parents or my husband to use since we have the graco 4ever in mysuv. We put it away when we don’t need it and whoever is taking my daughter out while I’m working just easily sets it up in their car. Super light weight. We will take it for our trip to Orlando since the graco 4ever is really heavy to carry around. Very versatile, affordable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat specifically because it said it fits 3 across which I believe it could but I only need two across so we can fold down our third seat for access to the 3rd row. It doesn't fold all the way down but it does allow access to the 3rd row with out having to move all the seats around and that is convenient. I'm not sure a larger carseat would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat and my daughter loves it as well! It is very padded and soft and comfortable too. It's very pretty and it came on time as well. I was worried at first because several people told me they had a bad experience with this brand but it has been nothing but good to my daughter and she loves it very much, I can tell she feels like a big girl in it and I also love that she'll grow with it so she will be in this for a little bit which is cool with me!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa T Rall

customer_reviews.title: Does not recline!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a nice carseat, but it doesn't recline. Why advertise it as a seat for all ages if you can't recline? Major disappointment. I already got rid of the boxes so can't return it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Li Anne Kern

customer_reviews.title: May fit 3 across, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I put two side by side in my mini van, but now I can't move the third seat as I need to let kids into the back row as the seat is 1/2" wider than the carrier seat :( One part of the car seat sticks out just enough that the open moving seat can't move forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carseat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is so compact and nice! My toddler sits in it very comfortably. It gives her lots of leg room and is easy to install in front facing position. I have not used it in rear-facing position. Hopefully we never have to see the safety features on it but it seems pretty sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great for slim fit
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits 3 across with this one! We fit all 3 kids in the back seat of our truck with this car seat. Two are in car seats, and one isn’t. They have plenty of room, and this one is very comfy and soft for the baby. Loved it so much we bought 2
customer_reviews.author: CallMeDaddy812

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to the Cosco Mighty Fit from a older cosco brand carseat after a small car accident. This carseat has been so much more than I expected. Easy to set up. Very simple adjustable 5 point harness straps unlike some other brands i have used that were more difficult to readjust. The seat itself comes with a little extra head support and cushion which may not be necessary for safety reasons but definitely add to comfort and style. The cover is padded and almost feels like thin memory foam. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mary duhaime

customer_reviews.title: It fits, but not well!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat because we needed something skinny to fit 3 across in the back of a minivan. It's very comfortable and easy to adjust. It fits 3 across in the back but just barely. It's always a struggle to get the other two buckled because they are in booster seats. If it was even a half inch to an inch skinnier it would be a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: a great affordable car seat
customer_reviews.text: this is a really affordable car seat. my baby seems comfortable and is happier in the car than before. i had to roll up a towel to put under it for it to install correctly but that’s not a big deal to me. it’s a nice narrow seat; it fits in the middle seat of my kia sorento.
customer_reviews.author: emmad

customer_reviews.title: Good for compact car
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find car seats that will even fit in my old VW Golf... this one fits well! My kiddo was almost 1 and outgrowing her infant car seat so we got this one. It seems pretty comfy; she was happy during a 6-hour road trip. I’m glad I didn’t splurge on one of the more expensive seats out there because this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McPheron

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, head pillow has nice support.
customer_reviews.text: This one has a more supportive head pillow than the other Cosco one I have. My daughter sleeps well in this one and her head doesn't loll forward. It is great for forward facing. Not sure about rear facing because did not try it out in that mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vans!
customer_reviews.text: We own a home daycare and needed smaller, affordable carseats for our daycare van (Toyota sienna). We were so impressed by the seats! Not only do they provide comfort, but we (tightly) fit three across in the very back! This has become our go to carseat model.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected, but works for now.
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely not be able to fit 3 across in my car, luckily I don't need 3 across, just 2. Barely leaves any room for my older child to sit. I do like the seats besides that tho, price is right. I have the seats rear facing and my babies seem comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Its comfortable for baby with all of the cushion but this seat is so frustrating. It doesn't stay reclined up right and falls backwards. The straps constantly twist, is tighter on one side than the other, and is difficult to tighten and loosen straps.
customer_reviews.author: K.B

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and has enough room now. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Latrice serenity

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Seat gives me more leg room, but it can be tight in reverse for taller toddlers. Her feet were pressed pretty tightly around the truck's seat. Fitting the buckle through the seat is a struggle too but be patient. It's worth knowing they are safe.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year falls asleep in this seat all the time and her head just falls. Thesis padding is useless. I dropped the bottom part in so its at more of an angle her head is still down. I centrally return it i wouldn't buy it i wish I never did. I rather have a huge carseat but know my daughter is comfortable when she falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Easy and compact
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat. It is easy to put is and is nicely compact. It seems comfortable for my little guy. It has the standard 5 point harness that is easy to use. Would get it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Phelps-Roper

customer_reviews.title: My favorite forward facing car seat
customer_reviews.text: I like this car seat because it’s easy to switch out into another car, it’s lightweight, & it takes up very little room. I recommend for cars or trucks. My toddler likes it a lot! I do not recommend for little babies though, we didn’t get this car seat until my son could forward face.
customer_reviews.author: A HH

customer_reviews.title: It is a great size for a compact car but the head rest ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size for a compact car but the head rest is super hard to adjust and I feel like my son isn’t comfy in it as he is 15 months old and 25 pounds he is like smoshed in it the headrest doesn’t adjust high and I dont really like putting the straps in and out the seat I hate this seat but it will have to work as I don’t have money to go and get another one
customer_reviews.author: jasmine Rippin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for rear facing.
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this back to Amazon. We had to do rear facing and needed a cheaper seat for a vacation. It did not have a great angle in the car and wasn't stable to our liking.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nichols

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this for REAR FACING
customer_reviews.text: The seat is not compatible for rear facing like they advertise. After threading the straps through to rear face the seat, the seat moves and the top hits the seat of the car. If I were to slam on my breaks my baby’s face would slam right into the seat. Forward facing is fine. We had to use the tether belt to clip it under the backseat. Very sketchy and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: It fits in escape but still tight
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing another seat that did not fit in my 2013 ford focus i got this one and it fits on passenger side in reverse position but the front seat is still cramped so if we need to go anywhere as a family we will have to take our f150 but for just me and the kids it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cosco Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a nice carseat. We are using it as rear facing. It seems that the strap to install it rear facing really needs to be longer so you can pull it through to pull it the right direction in order to get it tight enough. Other than that it's a nice quality seat. It just made it difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best seat under $100
customer_reviews.text: lots of bang for the buck with this unit. we have had seats from uppa, graco, and safety1st. all are pretty comparable until you see this one which is a reasonable size, comfortable, easy to install, and under a hundred bucks...
customer_reviews.author: cambridge_legend

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For a less expensive solution for a truck my son doesn't usually ride in it was great. Wish it had the hook style locks instead of belt only but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something affordable, not too bulky, and safe. This car seat has definitely met out expectations. It's very basic. Would work well in a smaller vehicle, too.
customer_reviews.author: bmariemitc

customer_reviews.title: It's soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and easy to clean, it also seems to take up less room then a different rear facing car seat would witch is nice since my husband is tall he can sit in my car without his knees in the dash board. I also like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Nibbler

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Compact and fits well in rear facing position without taking up too much room from the front seat. The tradeoff is that it seems to provide less protection due to compact size and light material.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: We actually did not receive these seats originally and were refunded then went and bought them in store. They are PERFECT. So easy to set up. Much more room for little ones. Lots of head support. Wish we started right out with these!
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great size. Affordable. Definitely more comfortable than most car seats. Much lighter than car seats with bases. Cons: Child’s head falls down when sleeping if not positioned as reckoned as possible. Sits lower than average. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Zaubi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This fit just fine rear facing in my Toyota Camry. The directions to install it are confusing, and I am uncertain if I have it installed right so that concerns me. The straps were fairly easy to adjust, and she seems comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Church

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Even I figured out how to put this together and install it! Using YouTube was helpful. It's very well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: bermudagirl

customer_reviews.title: My daughter sleep more in it then her bed
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I sit my one year old daughter in it then she go to sleep in 10 minutes because it's very comfortable. I had another one before and my daughter was continuously crying until I reached to my destination.
customer_reviews.author: Kids

customer_reviews.title: So affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have just in case I need to transport my grandson, who’s 1, anywhere while babysitting. Perfect as he grows and very affordable as I won’t be using on a regular basis. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat. I bought it for my 1 year old that outgrew her infant seat. It has alot of cushion and is easy to install. And you can recline it a little bit. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Myranda R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable car seat
customer_reviews.text: What can you not love about this car seat? Padded seats, included all the safety feature, lighter weight and best of all...affordable. Between this or the $200 car seat? Come on now. They are Not even far from each other. Im happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son. He is about to be 2 and lives this seat. We're have put it in forward facing and he sits comfortable in it
customer_reviews.author: Robin Friscia

customer_reviews.title: Some parts material are fragile!
customer_reviews.text: I forget how long I used it! But today I found that the lock on its seat belt is broken! But I don't know when or why it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust. Narrow for fitting in smaller vehicles and it does the job well. We have these as our “back up” seats in my work car and we are about to take them with us on vacation and will check them on the flight. Here’s hoping they stand up through the checked baggage process. We bought special bags for them.
customer_reviews.author: Prentice Geary

customer_reviews.title: NOT for Rear Facing!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use for rear facing. We did it exactly right, multiple times, and rear facing was never secure enough. The seat would be so wobbly I was scared to put my kid in it. Luckily, he is technically old enough and weighs enough to do front facing which is much more stable. We just were hoping to do rear facing for a bit longer. This was purchased as a cheap option for our second car which is rarely used. I would never use as my main car seat but it does the trick for only the handful of times it’s used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought when my 8 month old outgrew his pumpkin seat. Easy to install rear facing. Baby is now 3 and forward facing. Easy to change straps as he grows. Will keep until ready for booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Ok if child not in for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.text: Padding isn't adequate for long periods of time. Cup holder not easily attached, sturdy, or accessed by child. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: All sounds great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Love how soft and easy to clean it is. Let's be honest, if it's a good car seat, they're all hard to install. Lol. For my job I transport a bunch of children off various sizes. Easily adjustable! Fabric type is easy to clean too. Baby wipes take care of most any spills! Gotta love that!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a nice seat, brand new out of the box had a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: The seat appears to be a nice seat however when it was delivered the seat was damaged. It has a big hole in the side
customer_reviews.author: Kaysee B.

customer_reviews.title: love but they're wide
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the car seat but they are wide and that's my only complaint, you def can't fit all 3 together in a cars row seat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this carseat. The price is fantastic, unfortunately there's a reason for such a low price. It is difficult to install and adjust. Okay for a car that you won't ever move it. Very cheap feeling compared to others we own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this for rear facing
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get a safe install for rear facing. Major design flaw!!! Might be okay for forward facing but my babies aren't ready for that yet. Boxing these back up and returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Jshep1984

customer_reviews.title: Cranky baby approved
customer_reviews.text: My 17 pound cranky 3 month old loves this carseat. We rode to the store and back and he slept instead of screamed like in his infant britax seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Use the seat belt
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this car seat for rear facing. I could not get the latch tight enough so the seat would not move less than an inch. I had success with the car seat belt. I have grandchildren of various ages so I need a lightweight, easy to install seat because I have to switch often. It is lightweight, but I was hoping connecting the belt would be less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Marney

customer_reviews.title: Is this secure?
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable but not sure on sturdiness it security as facing backwards the seat still seems to move around a lot. Easy to put baby into but sits up very straight compared to her infant car seat so it is a bit of an adjustment for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Safe, Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat for my 2 year old. It’s comfortable for him and I feel great about his safety in it. So easy to install as well. I have another son who will need to upgrade car seats in a few months and I’ll definitely purchase another one of these. Can’t forget the price .... very reasonable for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Banaga

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install looks great in the car super safe and comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install looks great in the car super safe and comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Alanis Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great seat. Was looking for a cheaper option compared ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great seat. Was looking for a cheaper option compared to my first sons grace car seat. It’s a little smaller than the other one but MUCH easier to clean! But I hate the clips for connecting to the car. Over all a good car seat
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Slim design but hard to install correctly
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to install. But padded well for the price and is lightweight. I’ve used many car seats and this one is nice in our second vehicle but in order to get it in you have to pull the latch system and the right angle or it is almost impossible to tighten. But it looks nice and is soft. It isn’t bulky and actually fits behind the seat so the front row people aren’t in the dash!
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Weatherspoon

customer_reviews.title: ... it because we needed a chair that would be good for travel (we have a 15 mo) but because ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought it because we needed a chair that would be good for travel (we have a 15 mo) but because its safer for her to sit rear facing till two (2) this seat doesn't quite work at the moment so i had to return it for something that would lock into place properly.
customer_reviews.author: kaleonani

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, leaves lots of leg room, my older kids can walk around it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, safe and easy to care! And it is lighter than I expected. My toddler girl is happy about it! For this price point, I have no complaint! Hope it will last through my second child!~
customer_reviews.author: Kanier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The cup holder gets knocked off easily, but other than that, it's the easiest to install and take out quickly and it's really comfortable. I appreciate the ease with the cover, no struggle to take off to wash.
customer_reviews.author: shannan margart

customer_reviews.title: Narrow enough, but difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to get the angle of it right while rear facing. I end up having to wrestle with it every couple of uses to make sure it's at the correct angle.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product. There's no lower back support and child ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. There's no lower back support and child is very uncomfortable sitting in it for any period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Goforit.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this car seat I like the fact it was easy to install and my child is so comfortable in it. It’s the right size fit just right in my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Tresey

customer_reviews.title: Can't give a crash rating...we have not wrecked yet.
customer_reviews.text: good car seats. Only problem is they tend to shift backwards a little when rear facing.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow870

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. It is made well, good quality and really affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Mills

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my son
customer_reviews.text: Soft and plush, perfect for my son, and fits three across, which is fantastic. Fits great in both our cars, a Hyundai Sonata and Toyota Corolla.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. This was easy to install and seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This was easy to install and seems to be good quality. It’s also very comfortable for my son. We bought this as an extra so that my sister could transport him if needed, much better quality than I expected given the price! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to buckle
customer_reviews.text: The buckles are really awkward to buckle. It was hard to get a good fit into our Nissan Quest minivan. Seemed like a poor quality seat. We ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, doesn't have all the bells and whistles some do. My only complaint is it's probably the most difficult to install. Make sure you get a seat protector and a pool noodle or another base shimming system for 0-12 months to get the angle of the seat right.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The best carseat I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this carseat for the price but it was a very comfortable and compact seat. It didn't take up as much room as some of the other ones. And my grandchild loves to sit in this carseat.... and that is what it's all about!! I would buy this again.... in fact, I will once I get another grandchild :-)
customer_reviews.author: donna mellor

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter. Se seems to like it. Seems like it’s built very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car seat
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, comfy, easy to install and wash. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: lila

customer_reviews.title: Not a great option for rear facing.
customer_reviews.text: The seat seems comfortable, but very loose as a rear-facing seat and the fabric has a strong smell. Will be very secure once we can move it forward facing most likely. Very difficult to get rid of the manufacturer smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth one we have purchased! We love this seat! We have two children but need seats in both cars. Will be buying another one for MIL’s car.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fairchild

product_meta.title: Cosco Mighty Fit 65 DX Convertible Car Seat, Heather Navy
product_meta.description: Color:Heather NavyGet the car seat that's designed with your family's real life in mind. The cosco mighty fit 65 dx convertible car seat keeps your child safer in the car all the way from 5-65 pounds. It'll keep your baby comfortably rear facing up to 40 pounds, and then transitions to forward-facing mode up to 65 pounds. Not too big and not too small, the mighty fit 65 dx is designed to be the right size. In rear-facing mode, it has been designed to take up less room, which gives parents more leg room in the front seats. The car seat will also fit three across the back seat of most vehicles, which is great for growing families. Mighty fit 65 dx keeps kids safer with side impact protection built right in, and a 5-point harness that adjusts easily from the front of the seat. The harness features 5 heights and 3 buckle locations so you can be sure you're giving the best fit to your growing child. The mighty fit 65 dx convertible car seat is mighty comfortable for kids and convenient for parents too. Kids will love the plush padding and deluxe materials that give them an extra comfy ride. You'll love that the fabric is both machine washable and dryer safe, making this seat super easy to clean when messes happen. If your chosen vehicle happens to be an airplane, this convertible car seat has got you covered. Certified for use on aircraft, it gives your child a familiar seat during the flight. Its compact design also makes it easier to manage through airport security checks. The mighty fit 65 dx is proudly made by cosco in Columbus, Indiana. Made by American families for American families.
feature_bullets: An extra-comfortable ride that lasts for years: rear-facing 5-40 pounds and forward-facing 22-65 pounds
Fits 3 across in the back seat of most vehicles
Gives parent in the front seat more leg room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars817 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
